title: Gold 1 Support Looking For Duo / Clash Team

embed.description: Niege / Gold 1 2LP / 218W 208L Win Ratio 51% / Blitzcrank - 139W 102L Win Ratio 58%, Thresh - 58W 69L Win Ratio 46%, Hecarim - 4W 4L Win Ratio 50%, Morgana - 3W 4L Win Ratio 43%, Jarvan IV - 3W 3L Win Ratio 50%

body:
Evening Everyone,

I'm a support main, looking for a duo or clash team for solo queue. Happy to discuss things further, via PM. I'm trying to push to Platinum, maybe mid Platinum by end of season.

IGN: Niege 
Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/niege

I do have discord, with working microphone and would prefer the same. I'm ideally looking for a jungle / adc.

replies.body: he im a gold jg and adc player looking to join a clash team id be up to play with you if you want
